parameters.name: CenId
parameters.description: The ID of the Cloud Enterprise Network (CEN) instance to which the bandwidth plan is associated.

parameters.name: GeographicRegionAId
parameters.description:
The ID of one of the connected areas of the bandwidth plan. Valid values:

*   **China**: Chinese mainland
*   **North-America**: North America
*   **Asia-Pacific**: Asia Pacific
*   **Europe**: Europe

parameters.name: GeographicRegionBId
parameters.description:
The ID of the other area connected by the bandwidth plan. Valid values:

*   **China**: Chinese mainland
*   **North-America**: North America
*   **Asia-Pacific**: Asia Pacific
*   **Europe**: Europe

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Default value: **10**. Valid values: **1** to **50**.
